page.title: 09CLUBS/GUIDES
page.content: The Guide meeting takes place at 7:30 immediately after the Brownies have finished in the school hall. There are about 14 members, but this is soon to be increased by some people coming up from the Brownie pack when they are eleven. Mrs Wilford is the Captain of the group. We have groups as do the Brownies, but they have different names, and are called patrols as opposed to sixes. During the meetings we work towards some of the many badges that you can get, and then we have some games. In the summer we have lots of outdoor activities, and this is often really good fun. At the end of the evening, we all gather together in a horseshoe shape, to sing the traditional song and salute our Captain. We always say a prayer before we go home.
